decision_conditions: Prior to the occupation of the relevant phase of the development hereby approved, the location and full details of electric vehicle charging points for each pitch shall be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority. The approved details shall be implemented on site prior to the first occupation of the relevant phase of the development hereby approved and permanently retained thereafter.Reason: To encourage sustainable modes of transport and to ensure the development meets its operational needs, in accordance with Policies 36 and 37 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.

Prior to occupation of the relevant phase of development hereby permitted, a sensitive post-development lighting scheme shall be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority. The lighting scheme will update the submitted 'Impact Assessment On The External Lighting Installation At The Pastures', Banstead (Pope Consulting, February 2022) with final luminaries details and associated modelling.Lighting will be designed to minimise impacts on biodiversity as outlined in Guidance Note 08/18 Bats and Artificial Lighting in the UK [Bats and the Built Environment series by the Institute of Lighting Professionals and the Bat Conservation Trust].Reason: To protect the biodiversity value of the adjacent SINC, in accordance with Policy 26 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.
